scripts.zip: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd extension && zip -r extension.zip ./* -x ./*.js && cp extension.zip ../build/lesspass.firefox.xpi && mv extension.zip ../build/lesspass.chrome.zip && cd ..
scripts.browserify: rm -rf extension/dist && mkdir extension/dist && browserify ./extension/content.js -o ./extension/dist/content.min.js && browserify ./extension/popup.js -o ./extension/dist/popup.min.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run zip
